prompts: Create a rock-type Pokemon that has a rugged appearance and is known for its tough defense.
Show me a Pokemon that evolves from a small boulder and becomes significantly larger and stronger.
Imagine a Pokemon with gray skin and a boulder-like body, perfect for rock climbing challenges.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in mountainous terrains and displays a rocky texture all over its body.
Give me a Pokemon that specializes in ground attacks, combining rock and earth elements in battle.
Generate a creature that has a unique blend of gray and blue, with a sturdy physique.
Make a Pokemon that embodies strength and resilience, often found in caves or rocky areas.
